title: Poncho, 900–1200
medium:
Medium: linen and cotton
Technique: tapestry weave (?)
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor in memory of Alexander M. Bing
description: Poncho with neck opening, tapestry weave, with embroidered areas. Red and green in dark tones. Allover geometric pattern, highly stylized forms.
